item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Blue Pearl
130 Court Street
New Haven, CT 06511
203-789-6370
Manager - Ben

Come join the NHC at New Haven's swank Martini Bar...BLUE PEARL. They are normally closed on Mondays, however; with a promise of a minimum of 40 attendees, they will open just for us. If the weather is nice, Ben, will open the back patio for us as well. Yay for NHC!!!


Specials:

Martinis - Large for the cost of a small
Beer -
Guinness- $3
Cascazilla- $2

FREE Appetizers: from 6-8pm
Cheese Fondue

Contact is Robyn-Allise: 203-823-5302

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
